app.title: Le mauvais choix
app.subtitle: The Wrong Choice Game
app.description: Create deceptive answers and vote on the real one!

home.choose_play: Choose how you want to play:

rules.1: Game Master creates a session and poses questions
rules.2: Players submit fake answers that look plausible
rules.3: Everyone votes on which answer they think is correct
rules.4: Points are awarded based on votes received for fake answers
rules.5: Repeat with new questions and keep track of scores!

create.title: Create New Game Session
create.description: As the game master, you'll control the game flow and pose questions to players.

responsibilities.title: Game Master Responsibilities:
responsibilities.1: Pose interesting questions with correct answers
responsibilities.2: Control the game flow and timing
responsibilities.3: Start new rounds after results are shown
responsibilities.4: Share the session code with players

join.title: Join Game Session
join.description: Enter the session code provided by the game master and choose your name.

how_to_play.title: How to Play:
how_to_play.1: Wait for the game master to start a round
how_to_play.2: Submit a fake answer that looks believable
how_to_play.3: Vote on which answer you think is correct
how_to_play.4: Earn points when others vote for your fake answer
